mean_cn: n.工具，器具（读作/ˈɪmpləmənt/）；  vt.实施，执行（读作/ˈɪmpləˌmɛnt/）
mean_en: a tool or an instrument, often one that is quite simple and that is used outdoors
sentence: I use these implements to take care of my garden.
sentence_trans: 我用这些工具来打理我的花园。
word_etyma: im进 + ple满，填满 + ment名词后缀 → 装入并填满 → implement完成，实施
